column4: i need help playing videos!! "An error occurred!! Could not open location; You may not have permission to open the file."
<for EVERYONE!> "An error occurred!! Could not open location; You may not have permission to open the file."
HOW do i solve this problem with video streaming? "Could not open location; You may not have permission to open the file."
try using sudo or gksudo and see if that helps
it's not possible because i'm not using the terminal to open the video!
try gksudo *programname* and then use the program to try to open the stream
but why it starts to show this error while i used this way without problems?
I don't know. Are you opening a locally-stored file ?
is it a local-file stream, or an internet stream?
sorry, but the recent flood seems to have destroyed my scroll-back buffer. What was your problem again?
the video i'm trying to open from a site is showing an error!
Oh, that's right. Is it a problem with the video itself?
some links work, and other don't..
can you send me a link that does, and one that doesn't
I opened the first link fine in VLC. Perhaps try using that. It's a better player, IMO
